cab.content: Prom: General Plumor. Italy. To; C.I.3.S., War Office.Handed in 9 p.!ii, 24.12.17. Received 4.10 25.12.17.0.148. 24th,2arly tills morning the Italians "by a counter-attack rocovered a portion-of the ground lost ty them yesterday near the Asiago Plateau. At the same time there was considerable ground lost which has not boon regained. There is nothing else to-day tc report.
